description: Try our easy to follow American-Style Chicken Drumsticks & Coleslaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Chicken
name: American-Style Chicken Drumsticks & Coleslaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine sauces, vinegar, sugar and mustard in a small ovenproof baking dish. Add chicken drumsticks and turn to coat.
Transfer dish to oven and bake for 30 minutes or until golden.
Place 1/3 of the coleslaw into a small bowl and stir in mayonnaise.

Meanwhile, combine the butter and garlic in a small bowl. Cut bread into slices (don't cut all the way through). Spread butter into cuts. Wrap the bread stick in foil. Bake for 10 minutes. Serve chicken with coleslaw and garlic bread.
